task.title: Aligned Phones
task.shortdesc: Include aligned phones in your query results.

step.cmd: Select the Include aligned phones check box to return aligned results from both the IPA Target and IPA Actual tiers.

stepresult.note: You may refine your Phones query to results which match additional expressions in the IPA Target and/or IPA Actual tiers by following the steps below.

step.cmd: In the IPA Target Matcher and/or the IPA Actual Matcher section, select an Expression Type from the context menu.
Enter a search expression in the Expression field, using the key at the bottom as a guide if applicable.
Choose whether your query should be Case sensitive or an Exact match by selecting or deselecting the check boxes.
